choices.text:
### System:
You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can.

### User:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for this week.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews

### Response:


Monday - Breakfast: Oatmeal with mixed berries and a tablespoon of flaxseed oil. Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (carrots, broccoli, cauliflower). Dinner: Quinoa salad with grilled tofu and avocado slices.
Tuesday - Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made with almond milk, mixed berries, and a tablespoon of flaxseed oil. Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (carrots, broccoli, cauliflower). Dinner: Quinoa salad with grilled tofu and avocado slices.
Wednesday - Breakfast: Oatmeal with mixed berries and a tablespoon of flaxseed oil. Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (carrots, broccoli, cauliflower). Dinner: Quinoa salad with grilled tofu and avocado slices.
Thursday - Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made with almond milk, mixed berries, and a tablespoon of flaxseed oil. Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (carrots, broccoli, cauliflower). Dinner: Quinoa salad with grilled tofu and avocado slices.
Friday - Breakfast: Oatmeal with mixed berries and a tablespoon of flaxseed oil. Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (carrots, broccoli, cauliflower). Dinner: Quinoa salad with grilled tofu and avocado slices.
Saturday - Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made with almond milk, mixed berries, and a tablespoon of flaxseed oil. Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (carrots, broccoli, cauliflower). Dinner: Quinoa salad with grilled tofu and avocado slices.
Sunday - Breakfast: Oatmeal with mixed berries and a tablespoon of flaxseed oil. Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (carrots, broccoli, cauliflower). Dinner: Quinoa salad with grilled tofu and avocado slices.
